name: Splinter Soul
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target creature becomes flanked by an illusory copy of itself, appearing in the nearest empty adjacent space to the target. The copy is an exact copy with the Illusory modifier applied, takes its turn after the target, and does nothing except attempt to attack and kill the target and moving when necessary. If you are reduced to 0 hit points, the copy disappears.

Casting this spell again dispels any existing copies.
